**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 37 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 [Abridan Ashau](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1956) **Source** [Shadows at Sundown](/Sources.aspx?ID=121) pg. 26 **Perception** +18 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Requian](/Languages.aspx?ID=34), [Shoanti](/Languages.aspx?ID=41), [Varisian](/Languages.aspx?ID=44) **Skills** [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +22, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +18, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +20, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +18, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +17 **Str** +2 **Dex** +4 **Con** +2 **Int** +1 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +4 **Items** _+1 [explorer's clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2)_ (vestments of [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14)), [major staff of healing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=357) (6 charges; Trick DC 30), [_scroll of blindness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=26) (Trick DC 20), [_scroll of crisis of faith_](/Spells.aspx?ID=55) (Trick DC 20), 4 [_scrolls of heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (heightened to 5th level; Trick DC 26), [_scroll of flame strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=120) (Trick DC 26), 3 [_scrolls of sound burst_](/Spells.aspx?ID=292) (heightened to 4th level; Trick DC 23), [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14), key ring --- **AC** 28 **Fort** +13 **Ref** +15 **Will** +18 **HP** 190 **False Faith** Abridan is an ex-cleric. While he's lost the magical abilities that come from his connection to [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14), he can still use the _major staff of healing_ or any of his scrolls by tricking the item. Since he can't cast spells, he can't recharge his staff, and uses its remaining charges only as a last resort.
**Marked by Urgathoa** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Trigger** Abridan dies before he's had a chance to atone for his blasphemies or has become an actual cleric of [Urgathoa](/Deities.aspx?ID=19); **Effect** Urgathoa watched Abridan's fall from grace, and if he dies before he finishes his conversion, her disappointment causes his body to decay as if he had been dead for a week. This process also causes all living creatures within 30 feet to take 11d6 negative damage (DC 33 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save). If steps are not thereafter taken to prevent his soul from returning (such as by casting [_gentle repose_](/Spells.aspx?ID=131) on the partially decayed corpse), Abridan rises as a [dybbuk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1140) on the site of his death a minute after the next sundown and seeks revenge on the PCs for killing him. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** staff +16 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)), **Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning **Divine Rituals** DC 29 - **4th** [Rest Eternal](/Rituals.aspx?ID=36) - **5th** [Call Spirit](/Rituals.aspx?ID=5) **Trick Item** ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) Abridan attempts to trick his staff or a scroll by attempting a [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) check against the item's Trick DC listed above.
**Success** For the rest of his turn, Abridan can spend actions to activate the staff or scroll as if he could normally use it.
**Failure** Abridan can't use the item or try to trick it again this turn, but can try again on subsequent turns.
**Critical Failure** Abridan can't use the item, and can't try to trick it again until his next daily preparation at sunrise.
name: Abridan Ashau
